column4: Hi. Is there a general conventions or rule on where to install applications (like Program Files on Windows)?
normally you tend to install applications with software centre, or apt-get, they install automatically and do not provide you with choice of location
do you want to install it for all users, and have it accessible via terminal? or just run it locally from one user?
that will depend on what the file does, does it run the phpstorm, or does it compile it and install it on the system?
